FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, southwesterly 3 to 5, becoming cyclonic 6 to gale 8, perhaps severe gale 9 later . In north, mainly southerly, becoming cyclonic 4 to 6, then mainly northerly 3 or 4, occasionally 5.
Sea state
In south, slight or moderate, becoming moderate or rough, but very rough or high in southwest. in north, moderate or rough.
Weather
In south, thundery rain later. In north, rain.
Visibility
In south, good, occasionally poor later. In north, good, occasionally moderate.
